name: INterloper-Gold
description:
Interloper.

A person who becomes involved in a place or situation where they are not wanted or are considered not to belong.

You, Mooshie Noki, are one such person. Intruder. Trespasser.

Not by choice, mind you. But the world you've crashed into doesn't care for intent. Your ship's scattered parts have poisoned the land, and you must gather them before it's too late to reverse the damage you've dealt.

Before it's too late to go home.
